name: Yuanbin Zhou
body:
### About
I am a second year postgraduate student from [Hangzhou Dianzi University](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hangzhou_Dianzi_University), advised by Pro. [Guojun Dai](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Guojun_Dai) and Dr. [Yifan Wu](https://www.researchgate.net/profile/Yifan_Wu). My research interests include real-time system especially the limited preemptive scheduling algorithm and embedded system. I am expected to graduate in Apr. 2017 and look for a PhD position in Europe or Asia in the area of real-time system, embedded system, operating system and related filed. You can find my CV [here](https://github.com/hduffddybz/hduffddybz.github.io/blob/master/CV_Yuanbin.pdf).

### Contact
E-mail:(ybzhou.cn@gmail.com)
